Articles.Content:
Hi!

I've got small problem with Realism Overhaul.

When game is loading, it can hang on loading part containing Solid Fuel. I can repair it deleting the part from GameData.

How can I repair this? When I put the part back to GameData, it hangs on loading again.

Sometimes Module manager can freeze loading, but it's not very big problem. ---> same as here
Please follow the directions in the stickied post.
